name: devon-scope
effect: Reveals invisble kecleon on the overworld.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A device by DEVON
that signals any
unseeable POKéMON.

A device by DEVON
that signals any
unseeable POKéMON.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A scope that signals the presence
of any unseeable POKéMON.
It is made by the DEVON CORP.

A special device made by Devon Corporation that
signals the presence of any unseen Pokémon.
